description: Try our easy to follow Crepes With Strawberry Jam recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Sweet crepe,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Strawberry,Halal,High tea,Soy free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Crepes With Strawberry Jam Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour, milk, oil and a pinch of salt in a bowl, then combine until smooth.
Heat a greased nonstick pan over low-medium heat.
Pour quarter of mixture to cover base of pan, then cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden. Repeat with oil and remaining mixture to make 4 crepes. Serve with jam.
